statements: SELECT * FROM user_balances;
SELECT username, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances;
SELECT id, username, bitcoin_balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY bitcoin_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance > 1000;
SELECT username, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE ethereum_balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance > 1000 ORDER BY ethereum_balance DESC, username ASC;
SELECT id, username, bitcoin_balance FROM user_balances WHERE ethereum_balance < 5000;
SELECT id, username, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance = 0 OR ethereum_balance = 0;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND (bitcoin_balance > 5000 OR ethereum_balance < 100);
SELECT id, username FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance + ethereum_balance >= 10000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM account_information WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT full_name AS name, currency FROM account_information WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM user_balances ORDER BY bitcoin_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_balances ORDER BY ethereum_balance DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, currency FROM account_information WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances ORDER BY bitcoin_balance ASC, ethereum_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_information WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_balances
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance FROM user_balances
SELECT user_id, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances
SELECT bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances
SELECT * FROM user_balances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance > 0 ORDER BY bitcoin_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE ethereum_balance < 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_balance, ethereum_balance FROM user_balances WHERE bitcoin_balance > 0 AND ethereum_balance = 0;
SELECT user_id, SUM(bitcoin_balance) AS total_bitcoin_balance FROM user_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_bitcoin_balance > 10 ORDER BY total_bitcoin_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, currency, balance FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency, transaction_type FROM crypto_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT username, balance, currency FROM user_accounts WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_type FROM crypto_transactions WHERE amount > 0.5
SELECT currency_id, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currency_info ORDER BY exchange_rate ASC
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message FROM user_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_accounts
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 100
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency ORDER BY crypto_name DESC
SELECT user_id, crypto_id, amount, type FROM transactions WHERE type = 'buy'
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM account_logs
SELECT u.username, c.crypto_name, t.amount FROM user_accounts u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id INNER JOIN cryptocurrency c ON t.crypto_id = c.crypto_id;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, u.email, c.crypto_name FROM user_accounts u, cryptocurrency c, transactions t WHERE u.user_id = t.user_id AND c.crypto_id = t.crypto_id AND t.type = 'buy';

SELECT u.username, u.email, u.balance, c.crypto_name FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN user_crypto_balances b ON u.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN cryptocurrency c ON b.crypto_id = c.crypto_id ORDER BY u.balance DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.type, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN user_accounts u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 AND t.type = 'sell' ORDER BY t.date DESC;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
